_sText:
Glowing (particle) Teleporter

This is an Prefab of an Teleporter made of particle effects and glows. Why you created this? I've been working on an Deathrun map some time ago,and i needed a teleporter for it.At the beginning I only used env_spritetrails (connected to an func_rot brush) and an single env_lightglow, after an while i added dustmotes when you enter the teleport, an flash effect , more glow , fog within the teleporters volume and so on... now I think that it looks very pretty and futuristic ... like an anomaly ... pulling everything within its core ...

Features

~Random spritetrails that rotates around the core. ~Glowing Core ~Particles coming out of the core and spreading through the room when someone walks trough the teleporter ~Flashes your screen when walking trough the teleport (use only in sp read important note why you should only use this in singleplayer) ~Emitting particles from within the core flowing up and down ~Particles spreading out of the teleport destination if someone walks trough ~Short light flash (light_spotlight) when someone walks trough the teleport

Content

I included the prefab ready to be placed in your map and i also included an playable map to see the prefab ingame.

IMPORTANT NOTE

 it uses an ENV_FADE that flashes every player screen when someone walks trough the teleport i suggest that you remove the env_fade in mp games and kill the bad I/O connections via strg + p

(NoteÂ²: Maybe it can kill many fps on slow machines, because of the mass of particles. On my pc it worked fine, and my pc is really crappy

TRY IT INGAME FIRST BEFORE RATING IT LOOKS WAY MORE BETTER INGAME THAN ON THE SCREENSHOTS!!!

Update

~ _&i tokens added

Copyright

You may not release it as your own work or make changes and reupload without my permission. Any questions? use the feedback button :P Have fun and add me to the credits if you use this in your map :D
